about_the_game:
Magical Girl Dash




Magical Girl Dash is a retro arcade where you control Sophie, a normal student, but secretly she is also a magical girl fighting against evil forces that threaten the world! Defeat alien cats swarming throughout the city in a runner style game. Sophie have 2 special moves, a long range magical attack and a powerful short distance klck. Watch out as some enemies may only be defeat if one of the two types of attack!

Features


  • Run and Shoot - run and jump, dodge and shoot. Keep running and increasing your score for the longer time you can manage while you shoot evil alien cats with your magical powers.
  • Cute Magical Girl Game - Style inspired on the classic genre of Magical Girl. Do you have a never ending passion of Sailor Moon, Precure, Card Captors Sakura and other magical girl related media? If yes you will definitely enjoy Magical Girl Dash!

  • Save the Bakery - Evil aliens stole all the recipes from Sophie's favorite bakery. This is a great disaster! Help her finding all recipes and protect the bakery from bankruptcy at all costs!

  • Retro Art - Charming and beautiful 16-bit pixel art style.

  • Online and Local Highscore - Defeat enemies, collect stars and find sweets to increase your score. Try to beat your personal score and aim for the global highscore.

  • Multiple powerups - find powerups that makes the magical attacks more powerful! Triple shot, homing bullet, large shot. Find as many as you can to increase your firepower and chances of survival!
detailed_description:
Magical Girl Dash




Magical Girl Dash is a retro arcade where you control Sophie, a normal student, but secretly she is also a magical girl fighting against evil forces that threaten the world! Defeat alien cats swarming throughout the city in a runner style game. Sophie have 2 special moves, a long range magical attack and a powerful short distance klck. Watch out as some enemies may only be defeat if one of the two types of attack!

Features


  • Run and Shoot - run and jump, dodge and shoot. Keep running and increasing your score for the longer time you can manage while you shoot evil alien cats with your magical powers.
  • Cute Magical Girl Game - Style inspired on the classic genre of Magical Girl. Do you have a never ending passion of Sailor Moon, Precure, Card Captors Sakura and other magical girl related media? If yes you will definitely enjoy Magical Girl Dash!

  • Save the Bakery - Evil aliens stole all the recipes from Sophie's favorite bakery. This is a great disaster! Help her finding all recipes and protect the bakery from bankruptcy at all costs!

  • Retro Art - Charming and beautiful 16-bit pixel art style.

  • Online and Local Highscore - Defeat enemies, collect stars and find sweets to increase your score. Try to beat your personal score and aim for the global highscore.

  • Multiple powerups - find powerups that makes the magical attacks more powerful! Triple shot, homing bullet, large shot. Find as many as you can to increase your firepower and chances of survival!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or greater
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 162 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: To access leaderboards and online content an Internet connection is required.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or greater
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 182 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: To access leaderboards and online content an Internet connection is required.

name: Magical Girl Dash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 32/64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or greater
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 160 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound.
  • Additional Notes: To access leaderboards and online content an Internet connection is required.

short_description: Magical Girl Dash is a retro arcade where you fight against the forces of evil in a runner style game. Protect the city and, most important of all, recover the stolen cakes from your favorite bakery!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
